# destinationPixelBufferAttributes

**Instance Property**

A dictionary of pixel buffer attributes that define which output frames passed to the processor must conform to.

## Declaration

```swift
var destinationPixelBufferAttributes: [String : any Sendable] { get }
```

## Inspecting the required configuration

- **sourcePixelBufferAttributes**: A dictionary of pixel buffer attributes that define what the source and reference frames passed to the processor must conform to.
